lexUnit.name: raincoat.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a long coat made from waterproofed or water-resistant fabric.

sentence.text: Florence re-emerged holding a plastic raincoat over herself and the baby , and got into the back seat .
She belted her raincoat over her pyjamas .
The sky was darkening , and no breeze disturbing the trees , so Juliet slipped on her red raincoat over her jeans and cream shirt .
